citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at12:19 PM on May
10, 2023.
The licensee was unable to conduct an inspection because she was exhibiting animals at this time. The licensee does
day trips only for exhibition. The inspector requested exhibit times and dates to reduce the possibility of attempted
inspections in the future.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at12:19 PM on May 
10, 2023. 
 
The licensee was unable to conduct an inspection because she was exhibiting animals at this time. The licensee does 
day trips only for exhibition.  The inspector requested exhibit times and dates to reduce the possibility of attempted 
inspections in the future. 
 
 
 
End Section
